Name: Dynarog 2
About the game: Dynarog 2 is the Sequel of Dynarog. You play as a Combat robot in a simulation that will push you to your limits. How far will you go in this dynamic and nervous twin stick shooter ? Dynarog 2 features : - Dual weapon / Equipement system : use both weapons and abilities to destroy everything - Trinket system to alter the way you play. - Class system that allow you to start with specific stuff and trinkets - Weapon Workshop : change weapons stats as you wish - Upgrades Station : Allow you to buy upgrades with game Currencies - Shop : Buy weapons and special abilities with game Currencies
Meta Title: Dynarog 2: Sep 12, 2021, Solsgames and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Dynarog 2? Check out the release date (Sep 12, 2021), developer insights from Solsgames, and a complete game summary.
